summary: The diff adds a MantraTemplatePreview component and updates query hooks/App logic to better handle null vs empty-string responses and reduce stale cached data, which plausibly addresses Mantra 48 rendering and template-preview fallback. However, App.tsx also includes unrequested deep-link/redirect URL parsing behavior (based on the visible truncated snippet).

hallucinated_features.description: Deep-link and redirect query-parameter handling (parsing /<veda-slug>/<number> routes and ?redirect=) for restoring selection from the URL.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1/REQ-2, which focus on rendering content for Samaveda Mantra 48 and showing a template preview fallback when all content fields are null.
